mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id ID, CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ', c.last_name) AS name, COUNT(*) AS overdue FROM customer c, rental r, inventory i, film f WHERE c.customer_id = r.customer_id AND r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id AND i.film_id = f.film_id AND DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) > f.rental_duration GROUP BY name HAVING COUNT(*) > 20

mapper.update: UPDATE customer c, (SELECT customer_id, max(rental_date), datediff(NOW(), max(rental_date)) FROM rental GROUP BY customer_id HAVING datediff(NOW(), max(rental_date)) > 365) A SET c.active = 0 WHERE c.customer_id = A.customer_id
